title: Average annual wages in Italy 2000 to 2018
summary: In general Average annual wages in euros has stayed the same over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2011 and 2012.
Maximum Average annual wages in euros, about 30620.0 was reported at Year 2010
The lowest Average annual wages in euros, of value 29042.0 was reported at Year 2003
min_summary: Overall Average annual wages in euros has increased over the Year.
